edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory

  • public class FacultyDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a directory of all faculty at NC State.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FacultyDirectory()
      Creates an empty faculty directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FacultyDirectory

        public FacultyDirectory()
        Creates an empty faculty directory.

    • Method Detail

      • newFacultyDirectory

        public void newFacultyDirectory()
        Creates an empty faculty directory. All faculty in the previous list are lost unless saved by the user.

      • loadFacultyFromFile

        public void loadFacultyFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Attempts to populate the FacultyDirectory object with values parsed from the specified filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to load into FacultyDirectory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified file cannot be accessed.

      • addFaculty

        public boolean addFaculty(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String repeatPassword,
                          int maxCourses)
        Adds a Faculty to the directory. Returns true if the faculty is added and false if the faculty is unable to be added because their id matches another faculty's id. This method also hashes the faculty's password for internal storage.
        Parameters:
        firstName - faculty's first name
        lastName - faculty's last name
        id - faculty's id
        email - faculty's email
        password - faculty's password
        repeatPassword - faculty's repeated password
        maxCourses - faculty's max courses.
        Returns:
        true if added

      • removeFaculty

        public boolean removeFaculty(java.lang.String facultyId)
        Removes the faculty with the given id from the list of faculty with the given id. Returns true if the faculty is removed and false if the faculty is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        facultyId - faculty's id
        Returns:
        true if removed

      • getFacultyDirectory

        public java.lang.String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
        Returns all faculty in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
        Returns:
        String array containing faculty first name, last name, and id.

      • saveFacultyDirectory

        public void saveFacultyDirectory(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all faculty in the directory to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to save faculty to.

      • getFacultyById

        public edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.Faculty getFacultyById(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the faculty object associated with the ID string value that's passed in as an argument.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the faculty.
        Returns:
        null if the id does not match a faculty within the faculty directory. Otherwise, the Faculty object will be returned.
